title: Duties of the governor
context: ยง14-25 Duties of the governor. On or before the day of the meeting of the electors the governor shall deliver to the electors a list of the names of electors, and the governor shall perform any other duties relating to the presidential electors which are required of the governor by laws of the United States. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
